name: Escuela Costarricense de Aviación
about: Escuela Costarricense de Aviación (ECDEA) is a premier flight school in Costa Rica, operating from the Tobias Bolaños International Airport. With over 25 years of experience, ECDEA is dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. Our fleet is unparalleled, and our instructors are among the most experienced in the industry. We offer a range of programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), as well as training in Instrument Flight Rules (IFR) and multi-engine flying. ECDEA is committed to turning aspiring pilots into professionals, ensuring a comprehensive and high-quality education. Invest in your future with a serious and reputable institution like ECDEA.
services:
["GROUNDSCHOOL
Private Pilot License
Instrument Flight Rules
Commercial Pilot License
MULTI-ENGINE"]
